/**
     * Method called to remove specified method, assuming
     * it exists in the Map
     */

/** * Method that will find all sub-classes and implemented interfaces * of a given class or interface. Classes are listed in order of * precedence, starting with the immediate super-class, followed by * interfaces class directly declares to implemented, and then recursively * followed by parent of super-class and so forth. * Note that Object.class is not included in the list * regardless of whether endBefore argument is defined or not. * * @param endBefore Super-type to NOT include in results, if any; when * encountered, will be ignored (and no super types are checked). */
